tool_description: Estimates market pricing for products/services from suppliers based on specifications, market conditions, and historical pricing data.

supplier_ids.description: Array of supplier IDs to get pricing estimates for

product_category.description: Category of product or service for pricing

contract_duration.description: Contract duration (1 month, 6 months, 1 year, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid supplier_ids: At least one valid supplier ID is required.
Invalid product_category: Product category must be specified and recognized.
Invalid quantity: Quantity must be a positive integer.
Invalid delivery_terms: Use standard INCOTERMS (FOB, CIF, DDP, EXW, etc.).
Invalid payment_terms: Use standard payment terms format (NET30, COD, etc.).
Invalid contract_duration: Use format like '1 month', '6 months', '1 year'.
Pricing data unavailable: Unable to generate price estimates for some suppliers.
Market data insufficient: Limited market data available for accurate pricing estimates.
usage: Provide supplier_ids, product_category, and quantity for pricing estimates. Optionally specify delivery_terms, payment_terms, and contract_duration. Returns estimated pricing ranges and market position for each supplier.

supplier_ids.description: Array of supplier IDs with price estimates

estimated_prices.description: Estimated unit prices for each supplier

market_position.description: Market positioning (economy, mid-market, premium) for each supplier

total_cost_estimates.description: Total estimated costs including delivery and fees
